OUTLINE : Patients receive cytarabine intravenously ( IV ) continuously 24 hour day 1-7 , idarubicin IV 30 minute day 1-3 . Based result kinase inhibitor assay , patient receive either sorafenib tosylate PO twice daily ( BID ) , sunitinib malate PO daily , dasatinib PO daily , nilotinib PO daily , ponatinib hydrochloride PO daily day 8-29 absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
